channel.title: Hws on Reproducible Data Analysis: Fall 2021

item.title: HW 1: Reproducible research
item.description: Reading Please read the article from the BBC here here and the article from The Conversation here about two influential economists who made an even more influential Excel error. Assignment Each student individually should write a one-paragraph response to it, describing your view of what happened and what, if anything, could have been done to prevent the error.
